segments.text: my lease ends next month , so I have to find a new place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel sorry for you . It's a jungle out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well . I guess I can ask around to see if anyone's got a room or apartment available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank you . I think I should also have a look at the Internet to see if anyone's got a sublet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how much do are you looking to spend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can only afford about 1,000 yuan a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: looks like you'll have to get a place in the suburbs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it doesn't matter , but it needs to be close to the subway or on a convenient bus route .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: anything you need to have in the place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want a bedroom with full bath , and it'll be better if the bedroom is on the sunny side .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you can also check out university bulletin boards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why ? Will those be students who are leaving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not really , but landlords put up notices to attract students and they often have low rent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank you . I'll be sure to take a look .
segments.speaker: S1
